actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to provide emergency assistance for the repair of certain weather related damage to highways and urban mass transportation systems due to the winter of 1977-1978.
short_title: Emergency Highway and Transportation Repair Act

summary.text: Emergency Highway and Transportation Repair Act - Directs the Secretary of Transportation to enter into a contract with each State for payment of 100 percent of the costs of repairing highways and surface rails of urban mass transportation systems (other than railroads) which were damaged as a result of the winter weather of 1977-1978. Authorizes appropriations of $250,000,000 out of the Highway Trust Fund to carry out the purposes of this Act.

titles.title: Emergency Highway and Transportation Repair Act
A bill to provide emergency assistance for the repair of certain weather related damage to highways and urban mass transportation systems due to the winter of 1977-1978.
